text: avar parannu: "iva vilakkappetta kalikalum vilakalumakunnu. nannaluddesikkunnavarallate, ava tinnan patilla.” avar svayam ketticcamacca vadamanit. avar savari ceyyanum carakku cumakkanum puram upayeagikkunnat nisid'dhamakkiya marru mrgannalunt. avar allahuvinre namam uccarikkatta mrgannalumunt. iteakkeyum avar allahuvinre peril ketticcamaccuntakkiyavayan. avar ivvidham ketticcamaccuntakkunnatin allahu avarkk vaikate matiyaya pratiphalam nalkum
